      • canCapt

        public boolean canCapt​(Tile start,
                       Tile end)
        Tests whether the piece that is being moved can capture another piece specified and returns a boolean as an output. Only compares the ranks of the two pieces
        Parameters:
        start - the starting tile/piece or the tile/piece that is being moved
        end - where the tile/piece is going to end on or what the piece is trying capturing
        Returns:
        true if it the starting tile can capture the end tile otherwise, false.

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove​(int startRow,
                       int startCol,
                       int endRow,
                       int endCol,
                       Player currentPlayer,
                       Tile[][] board)
        Checks if the move can be done based on the state of end location, and if an Animal piece can be captured
        Parameters:
        startRow - starting row location
        startCol - starting column location
        endRow - end row location
        endCol - end column location
        currentPlayer - The current player moving
        board - entire gameboard
        Returns:
        return true if the move can be done, false if not
